document.full_text: mr. perry, who was known as the 'jet' throughout his career, was one of pro football's top runners in the decade after world war ii and the first to run for 1,000 yards two n.f.l. seasons in a row.
document.title: joe perry, hall of fame fullback, dies at 84
lines_and_colors: mr. perry, who was known as the 'jet' throughout his career, was one of pro football's top runners in the decade after world war ii and the first to run for 1,000 yards two n.f.l. seasons in a row.
